title: Does everyone get the draven icons?
body: So, everyone seems to have these draven icons and I have yet to get them. How do you unlock? Or do I just need to be patient? Thanks friends.

replies.body:
Here are the icons that were made available in commemoration of Draaaaaven Day 2016:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/draven-day-2016#section-things
